solution_line_template: If the shopkeeper bought {num_packets} packets of milk, each packet containing {ml_per_packet}ml of milk, all the packets had a total of {ml_per_packet}*{num_packets} =<<{num_packets}*{ml_per_packet}={total_ml_milk}>>{total_ml_milk}ml

Since one ounce equal {ml_per_ounce} ml, the total amount of milk that the shopkeeper bought in oz is {total_ml_milk}/{ml_per_ounce}=<<{total_ml_milk}/{ml_per_ounce}={total_oz_milk}>>{total_oz_milk} oz of milk
